# GCHapticsLocality

**Structure**

The location of one or more haptics actuators on a game controller.

## Declaration

```swift
struct GCHapticsLocality
```

## Discussion

Use this symbol to specify the location of the actuators when creating a haptic engine.

## Localities

- **default**: The default location of a haptics actuator on a game controller.
- **all**: All locations of haptics actuators on a game controller.
- **handles**: All handles on a game controller.
- **leftHandle**: The left handle on a game controller.
- **rightHandle**: The right handle on a game controller.
- **triggers**: All triggers on a game controller.
- **leftTrigger**: The left trigger on a game controller.
- **rightTrigger**: The right trigger on a game controller.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates a locality structure with a string value.

## Getting the localities

- **supportedLocalities**: The locations of haptic actuators on the device.

## Conforms To

- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
